title: Eduardo Escobedo
text:
Eduardo Felipe Escobedo Mateo (born 4 February 1984) is a <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> professional <a href="Boxing">boxer</a>.
Professional career.
WBO Super Bantamweight Championship.
On December 8, 2007 Eduardo lost to <a href="Daniel%20Ponce%20de%20Le%C3%B3n">Daniel Ponce de León</a>, the bout was for Ponce's <a href="World%20Boxing%20Organization">WBO</a> <a href="Super%20Bantamweight">Super Bantamweight</a> title.
In June 2010, Escobedo beat the veteran Aristides Perez by T.K.O. to win the <a href="World%20Boxing%20Council">WBC Silver</a> <a href="super%20featherweight">super featherweight</a> title, the bout was held at the Estadio Centenario in <a href="Los%20Mochis%2C%20Sinaloa">Los Mochis, Sinaloa</a>, <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>.
